markdown-clip.copyAsHtml.title: Clip to clipboard as HTML
markdown-clip.configuration.removeHeadin: Disable automatic heading ID generation (<h1 id='title'>).
markdown-clip.configuration.removeVSCode: Disables automatically generated VSCode attributes (<h1 data-line, class='code-line', dir='auto'>).
markdown-clip.configuration.markdown-it-: Hide custom IDs (in {#id} format) in the preview screen and directly apply them to headings as attributes.
